title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the first match is not auto-selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not automatically selected.
EB: The search result should be automatically selected when double-clicking on it.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Perform a search for references to the specified field.
2. Double-click on any search result.
